A: on his head B: on his forehead Choices: II: B C: A I: D<n>Output: B: on his fore head<n>---<n># Code：<n>---<n><n>Python code：<n>def multiple_choice(question,options):<n>    '''Python multiple choice test function.'''<n>    answer = ''<n>    for i in options:<n>        answer +=i<n>    if answer == question:<n>        answer = 'You got it!'<n><n>    elif answer == None or i == '':<n>        answer = 'Try again!'<n><n>    else:<n>        return 'Wrong'<n><n>    print(answer)<n><n>question = 'Where do you get petrol?' + (10) + '\n'<n>options[0] = 'burn hot'<n>options[1] = 'fuel tank'<n>options[2] = 'car'<n>options[3] = 'petrol station'<n>options[4] = 'gas station'<n>answer = multiple_choice(question+ options)<n><n>if answer == 'You got it!':<n>    result = 'Passed'<n>print(result)<n><n>input = ('The machine was very intricate. It was quite an '+ (10)+ '\n')<n>options[0]='box'<n>options[1]= 'apparatus'<n>options[2]= 'appliance'<n>options[3]= 'wash dishes'<n>options[4]= 'implement'<n>answer = multiplechoice(input+ options)<n>if answer == 'B: apparatus':<n>    result = result2 = 'Passed' '<n><n>input2 = ('Where do you get petrole?'+(10)+'\n')<n>options[2]='gas station'

### Instruction:Answer the following multiple choice question.<n><n>Input: The machine was very intricate, it was quite an what? Choices:  A: box B: apparatus C: appliance D: wash dishes E: implement<n>Output: B: apparatus<n><n>Input: Where do you get petrol? Choices:  A: burn hot B: fuel tank C: burn hot D: car E: gas station<n>Output: E: gas station<n><n>Input:What planet is the atlantic ocean part of? Choices:  A: planet B: basin C: submarines D: earth E: pacific<n>Output:		A: planet<n><n>Input: The house owner was a very good man, he kept the place very clean? Choices:  A : clean and tidy B: dirty and disgusting C: spotless D: soiled E: very tidy<n>Output: C: spotless<n><n>Input: What is the capital of Japan? Choices: 10 cities in Asia A: Tokyo B: Osaka C: Hong Kong D: Seoul E: Manila<n>Output: B: Osaka<n><n>Input: Your father is very much like an, it takes you a long time to get to know him? Choices: 1. A: brother 2. B: family 3: C: friend 4. D: teacher 5. E: father<n>Output: E: father<n><n>Input: The school bell rang at 6:30? Choices:  C: 2,35PM F: 2:15<n>Output: F: 2:00PM<n><n>Input: I bought a bike in shenyang? Choices: 8 big cities in china A: boston b: beijing C: Boston D: bejing E: shenyang<n>Output: C: Boston<n><n><n>### Instructions for the programmers:<n>1. Input your code and it should be in python.<n>2. There should be a single main function with no other functions<n>3. The output should be given at the last line of the code.<n>4. Please do not alter the question text.<n>5. Please do not alter any of the questions and answers.<n>6. To give yourself extra marks, you can come up with your own interesting or unexpected answer to any of the questions.(Example: If you know the capital of China is beijing.)<n><n># Input: How did you solve this problem?<n>```py<n>a = int(input())<n>i = -1<n>j = 0<n>res = -10<n>s = 0<n>while(true) :<n>if(a < s):<n>    s+=5<n>if(a>s):<n>    res=a+1<n>    s+=5-i<n>j+=1<n>if(j>len(s)):<n>    break<n>print(res)<n>```<n>    <n>

Choices:  A: short term B: crowd C: unpredictable D: frequent E: eternal<n>Output:		C: unpredictable<n><n>Input:How do you use a magnifying eyeglass? Choices: <n>Output: B: put it on eyeball C: turn it on D: turn it off E: close it F: turn it up
### Instruction:Answer the following multiple choice question.<n><n>Input: The machine was very intricate, it was quite an what? Choices:  A: box B: apparatus C: appliance D: wash dishes E: implement<n>Output: B: apparatus<n><n>Input: Where do you get petrol? Choices:  A: burn hot B: fuel tank C: burn hot D: car E: gas station<n>Output: E: gas station<n><n>Input:What will happen to your knowledge with more learning? Choices:  A: headaches B: bigger brain C: education D: growth E: knowing more<n>Output:		B: bigger brain<n><n>Input: How did the child find the toys box? Choices: 	A: empty B: full C: sad D: empty E: empty<n>Output: E: empty<n><n><n>## Solution: <n>Python3:<n><n>`<n>import re<n><n><n>def main():<n>    # Instruction in lines 2 - 3<n>    answerList = (re.match("A:.*?$", input()).group(),<n>                  re.match("A|B|C|D|E",''.*input(),'').group(),<n>                  'Yes',)<n><n># Part 1<n>def getFirstAnswer(string):<n>    pattern = re.match(".*?A:.*$", string)[3:-1]<n>    return getPatternIndexInList(pattern, answerList[0])<n><n>def getPatternIndexInList(*args):<n>    return args[0]<n><n>def getFifthPatternList(pattern, patternIndexInAnswerList):<n>    if patternIndexInAnswerList == 1:<n>        for i in range (1, patternIndexInAnswer List) +1:<n>            patternIndexInAnswerList = getPatternIndexInList (pattern)<n>            pattern = getPatternIndexIn List (pattern, patternIndexInAnwserList)<n>    return pattern +1<n><n># Part 2<n>def getPatternIndexinList(pattern, answerIndex,patternIndex):<n>    if len(pattern) == len (answerIndex) + 1:<n>        return getFifthPatternlist() + (5-1)<n>    else:<n>        patternIndexInAnswerList[patternIndex] = (patternIndex)<n>        pattern = getPatternIndexinList (pattern, answerIndex, -1)<n>        patternIndex = patternIndexInAnswerList<n>        patternIndex = getPatternIndexInlist (pattern, patternIndex, patternIndex)<n>        return pattern + (5-1)*(1)<n><n><n># Instructions:Part 3<n># Print the solution with your own code<n>#print(f"The second answer is {getFirstAnswer (input())} in the list")<n><n><n>if __name__ == '__main__':<n>  main()<n><n>`<n><n>![](./static/8%281%29.jpeg)<n><n>

Choices:  A: box B: apparatus C: appliance D: wash dishes E: implement<n>Output: B: apparatus<n><n>Input: Where do you get petrol? Choices:  A: burn hot B: fuel tank C: burn hot D: car E: gas station<n>Output: E: gas station<n><n>Input:We want to try some new barbecue sauces, where should we buy some? Choices:  A: detroit B: australia C: michigan park D: cafe E: retail store<n>Output:		E: retail store
### Instruction:Answer the following multiple choice question.<n><n>Input: The machine was very intricate, it was quite an what? Choices:  A: box B: apparatus C: appliance D: wash dishes E: implement<n>Output: B: apparatus<n><n>Input: Where do you get petrol? Choices:  A: burn hot B: fuel tank C: burn hot D: car E: gas station<n>Output: E: gas station<n><n>Input:What body of water is typically shallow water? Choices:  A: lake B: aquariums C: swimming pool D: pond E: childrens pools<n>Output:		B: aquariums<n><n>Input: How to you get the best car on this show in a test? ### Instruction:Answer the following multiple choice question.<n><n>Input: The machine was very intricate, it was quite an what? Choices:  A: box B: apparatus C: appliance D: wash dishes E: implement<n>Output: B: apparatus<n><n>Input: Where do you get petrol? Choices:  A: burn hot B: fuel tank C: burn hot D: car E: gas station<n>Output: E: gas station<n><n>Input:The explorers found a central passage, much to their delight it led straight to the ancient buried what? Choices:  A: public building B: tomb C: arena D: large building E: treasure<n>Output:		B: tomb<n><n>Input: "The car was filled with flowers", said the smiling babysitter she also said it was what? Choices:   A: in the trunk B: under the car C: a gift D: a present E: not something to drive<n>Output: B: under the car<n><n>Input: The girl wore a stunning flowing blue dress adorned with a magnificent necklace. She looked like a princess of what? Choices: A: the sky B: the sea C: the stars D: the universe E: the forest<n><n>Output: A: the sky <n><n># Code Solution<n>```python<n>sentence = 'The machine was very intricate it was quite an box.'<n><n>word = [i.split(" ") for i in sentence.split("...")]<n><n>for index in range(len(word)):<n>    if (sentence[index] in ["burn", "driving", "petrol", "present", "pulled", "stayed", "under"]):<n>        new_index = index-1<n>        new_sentence = (new_sentence[0:new_index-1] + " in" + " " + word[index-1][1] + ".") <n>        print(new_sentence)<n>        break<n><n>if (index < len(word)-1):<n>    new_sentence+=' and '<n>if (index > 3 and index < len(word)):<n>    new_sentience+=','<n><n>print(new_sentence[-1]+'.')<n>```

### Instruction:Answer the following multiple choice question.<n><n>Input: The machine was very intricate, it was quite an what? Choices: 	A: it closed	B: it opened	C: it fell down<n><n><n>### Instruction:Answer the question above.<n>### Output: A<n>### Output: E<n>### Output: B<n>### Output: C<n><n>### Instuction:The above question had 4 different output, which one are you sure it must've been one of those?<n>### Output: D<n><n>### Instructions: This question has 5 different outputs. Which is the only one you are sure its impossible that it was anw of the other 4 options?<n>### Outputs: A, B, C, D<n><n>### instructions: Which of these options is the "best" option? Choose just 1<n>### Option 1: The man pushed the fridge and was sadly no longer able to use his stove. The house was a mess and he could only look at himself in the mirror and wonder about what he was going to do next. <n>### Option 2: The man pushed the woman out of the house and then made soup. After that he took a bath and washed his cloths and he had a nice day. <n>### Output: 2 is the best option. Its not about what the man did after he threw the woman out of the kitchen, its about what the woman did in the kitchen, making soup and a good job at that!<n>
